Bartholomew college of health is a college of health accredited by the National Board of Tertiary Education. We are located in Kwara state (The state of Harmony). We have produced seasoned health personnels and will still continue to produce more.

Bartholomew College of Health Technology, Shao is a citadel of learning with a difference. We are focused on building quality health personnel.

Our school campus is located opposite Shao-Olooru Express Junction, Shao Kwara. We have a serene and conducive environment where our students learn and practicalize. We also have seasoned lecturers who impact knowledge and morals in our students.

Our Mission

To transform into a world class teacher institution where staff and students will feel challenged to dedicate their services to the betterment of humanity.

Our Vision

To be a leading teacher education institution characterized by an inclusive and enabling value-driven professional culture and recognized globally for academic excellence and a focus on quality.

Core Values

*  Respect.
*  Integrity.
*  Excellence.
*  Service.
